sentence.Network_en: Originally released in 1957, the film was remade as "The Magnificent Seven".
sentence.Network_cn: 这部电影最早在1957年上映，后被翻拍为《七侠荡寇志》。

sentence.Network_en: The plane has been kept in service far longer than originally intended.
sentence.Network_cn: 这架飞机已经超期服役很长时间了。

sentence.Network_en: Shakespearean women's roles were originally written to be played by men.
sentence.Network_cn: 莎士比亚笔下的女性角色在创作之初是打算由男性来扮演的。

entry.def: When you say what happened or was the case originally, you are saying what happened or was the case when something began or came into existence, often to contrast it with what happened later.

example.ex: The plane has been kept in service far longer than originally intended...
example.tran: 这架飞机已经超期服役很长时间了。

example.ex: France originally refused to sign the treaty...
example.tran: 最初法国拒绝签署该条约。

means.word_mean: 2. with reference to the origin or beginning

sentences.sentence: "why didn't you tell me in the first place?"

auth_sentence.content: The band was originally named "The Bottlegarden".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The band was originally named "The Bottlegarden".

auth_sentence.content: The Sex ID test was originally an online experiment.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Sex ID test was originally an online experiment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Sex ID test was originally an online experiment.

auth_sentence.content: It originally referred to Jeanne Townsend as Jean Thompson.

stems_affixes.word_buile: origin[n.起源,由来;出身,来历]+al……的→adj.最初的,原文的;新颖的 n.原物,原作,原文
ab加强+origin起源+al……的→起源而来→原始的
original最初的+ly表副词→adv.最初, 原先
orig升起,开始+in→生命开始→起源
origin[n.起源,由来;出身,来历]+al……的→adj.最初的,原文的;新颖的 n.原物,原作,原文
origin起源+ate表动词→v.[in,from]起源,发生;首创,创造

Sentence.sentence: Named after a river that passes through the Congo, the Ebola virus originally manifested itself in the interior of Africa in 1976.
There were originally six of them.

sentences.en: After much discussion they settled on the plan originally proposed.
sentences.cn: 他们讨论了很久,然后确定了原来提出的那个计划。

sentences.en: We started out originally as a taxi firm.
sentences.cn: 我们起初开业时是一家出租车公司。

sentences.en: 75 per cent of the amount originally borrowed is still outstanding.
sentences.cn: 最初的借款仍有75% 未偿还。
